author: gkossakowski
msg: Get rid of dependency on EnvironmentHelper. There is no such thing like sitemap-specific ServiceManager anymore so we don't need to keep infrastructure supporting it.

author: gkossakowski
msg: At least for now we can't rely on Spring when it comes to dependency on ServletContext. It must be taken directly from CallStack but this introduces dependency on SSF implementation so should be considered as temporary solution.

author: fhanik
msg: Corrected use of Channel.getMembers() in cluster
Added debug hints to warning messages based on what may be wrong

author: stack
msg: HBASE-437 Clear Command should use system.out
